body:
# Installation
## Dependencies
* Boost
* soci(sqlite3 backend)
* yaml-cpp
* cmake

## Building
1. git clone git://github.com/theunknownxy/slin.git
2. cd slin
3. mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && make && sudo make install
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: slin
